com.newrelic.graphql.schema

Class SimpleGraphQLBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.newrelic.graphql.schema.SimpleGraphQLBuilder

  • public class SimpleGraphQLBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This builder provides a simple fluent interface for wiring up your schema for runtime execution. It also provides defaults for a few common scenarios to streamline getting started:
    • Default registration for scalar types as Strings until overridden otherwise
    • Default type resolving for interfaces/unions, so if your Java class names match your GraphQL type names no further customization is required
    • Simple builder methods for common operations (i.e. providing the fetcher for a field)

    If you need access to the lower level RuntimeWiring.Builder, use the configure function to provide a callback. If you need access to the GraphQL.Builder, then call builder() instead of build() to get the in-flight builder instance back. 

       Reader schemaReader = //... Read your GraphQL SDL from somewhere
   GraphQL graphQL = new SimpleGraphQLBuilder(schemaReader)
               .fetcher("Query", "myField", new QueryMyFieldFetcher())
               .build()
